title: Excellent food
text: The food in this place was excellent ! We ate a pizza with hum and mushrooms , it was delicious . Also we ate spaghetti with smoked bacon and tomato sauce. The staff was friendly and the prices normal. I will visit this place again for sure

title: Excellent
text: An excellent place next to our city center ! It's an ideal place to have dinner or lunch ! All the dishes were tasteful and also the staff was very friendly ! Finally the live music was very nice !

title: Excellent
text: Very beautiful place! The music was amazing we had a great time with my company ! Also it serves in the morning coffee and breakfast .

title: Perfect cocktails
text: The place is amazing and great decorated ! It has a variety of cocktails and all of them are excellent . I will visit the place again

title: Excellent
text: You have to visit this place in Christmas period ! The atmosphere is amazing because of the excellent Christmas decoration ! Unforgettable experience

title: Wine bar with excellent food
text: The place has many wine selections and a great chef ! The food was delicious , we loved every single dish ! The atmosphere takes you back to 40's . Finally the staff was very friendly .
place: By The Glass wine bar & bistrot

title: Wonderful
text: It is an unique experience visiting Acropolis . It is the best place in Athens an everyone must visit it !

title: Amazing view
text: The view was amazing! We had an unforgettable experience in this place! The food was excellent and well cooked
